text: :not to be confused with the Northeastern Correctional Center in Massachusetts Northeast Correctional Center is a Missouri Department of Corrections state prison for men located in Bowling Green, Pike County, Missouri. The facility opened in 1998 and has a working capacity of 2098. ==References== Category:Prisons in Missouri Category:Buildings and structures in Pike County, Missouri Category:1998 establishments in Missouri
title: Northeast Correctional Center
